products.name: Duradry 3-Step System
products.description: Award-winning starter kit to control excessive underarm sweating within a week. Three products work together to keep you ultra dry and fresh.

products.name: Duradry PM Sweat Minimizing Gel
products.description: Our most potent anti-sweat formula. Reduces sweating by up to 95% within a week.

products.name: Duradry AM Antiperspirant Stick
products.description: Clinical-strength antiperspirant to keep your underarms dry and odor-free. Talc and Silicone-free.

products.name: Duradry Wash Wipes
products.description: On-the-go rinse-less shower. Deodorize and clean your skin midday.

products.name: Duradry Body Spray
products.description: Aluminum-free body deodorant spray. Neutralizes odors anywhere on your body.

products.name: Duradry Wash
products.description: Powerful body wash to deep-clean and deodorize your skin.

products.name: Duradry Microfiber Gym Towel
products.description: The softest gym towel you'll ever use.
